title: Forbidden to Go Home to Visit Her Family
itunes:title: Forbidden to Go Home to Visit Her Family
description:
Join Megan Wyatt as she answers Wives of Jannah community member marriage related questions from her inbox. This episode addresses a friend who is emailing in with concern. She has learned that a husband is preventing his wife from traveling back to the country she grew up in to visit her family. She is asking if this is allowed in Islam and if the structure of marriage in Islam is set up to easily oppress wives because men have the final say on matters in the marriage. 

 

To ask a question of your own visit: www.wivesofjanah.com/askaquestion
